Border of Finland

Source: R/data.R
finland_map.Rd

Vertices of the Finnish border at the (approximately) 1km scale.

Usage

finland_map

Format

A list:

vertices

A matrix of the vertices, in decimal degrees (WGS84) of the Finnish border at the (approximately) 1km scale.

bbox

A vector of coordinates for a box bounding the Finnish border.

...

Source

https://www.stat.fi/org/avoindata/paikkatietoaineistot.html

Examples

library(finbif)
with(
  finland_map,
  {plot.new()
   plot.window(
     bbox[c(1, 3)],
     bbox[c(2, 4)],
     asp = 2.4
   )
   polygon(vertices)}
)
